name: toast
description: A toast tool written in JavaScript and CSS without any other dependencies.

scripts.deploy-master: git checkout master && node build.js && git add --all && git commit -m 'source files update' && git push origin master
scripts.build: node build.js && cp package.json ./_build && cp -r src/* _build/src/ && cp index.html _build/index.html
scripts.deploy-pages: git checkout gh-pages && cp -r _build/* . && git add --all && git commit -m 'update gh-pages' && git push origin gh-pages && git co master
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-master && npm run build && npm run deploy-pages
